name: Frog Knight (Avace, OrangeScientist1, Lavinnia, misterG420)
description:
The Knight is a noble hero of the lands, but he has a problem - he likes the company of women a little too much. One day he kisses a lady who turns out to be a Witch. She curses him to be a frog, after all a frog is hideous, right? No one wants a frog. But the Knight decides to fix this in the only way he knows - by getting the kiss of a Princess. This is a story of a Knight learning what it means to love and be loved.

Disclaimer: As with any game jam game, there is tiny bug that doesn't allow you to complete the last quest - woops.
